synopsis.text: This anime takes place in a futuristic Tokyo, where humans with extraordinary abilities, known as Attractors, are being ruthlessly pursued by a clandestine organization called Kestos. The Attractors, united in their quest for survival, are spearheaded by an idealistic young man named Quon. Haunted by the annihilation of his village and driven by the desire to protect his people, Quon is resolute in his mission to save as many Attractors as possible. With the blueprints of the Kestos headquarters in hand, Quon and his friends embark on a daring rescue mission to save their comrades Tei and Towa, facing imminent peril as they infiltrate the enemy's lair.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
